content: **poop bag holder crochet pattern** materials small amount of worsted weight cotton size g crochet hook yarn needle size approx 1/2 inch x 3 inches stitches used chain chain single_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch you will want to crochet tightly so that the bag does not stretch out easily you may need to adjust your hook size to get a nice tight stitch
